page.title: 03MELSONBY-Industry & Employ't
page.content: Collectively, farms in the area continue to provide the largest number of full & part-time jobs for the village. Most of this part-time work is domestic,gardening & seasonal (e.g. potato harvest) but even this latter work is disappearing with more mechanisation. The next highest number of jobs are provided by the Civil Service & Military at Catterick Garrison. The shop provides self- employment and some part-time jobs. A fair number of others are self- employed and include three small family haulage businesses , a nursery & landscaping business, two family building firms, a Civil engineering firm, a horticultural engineer and a small market garden enterprise. By far the greater proportion of people have to travel to the towns to work. Unemployment is on the increase.
